profile:
Since 2007, J and J Coatings has been providing expert parging services in Edmonton and the surrounding area. 

Our parging services can improve the appearance of your home, but more importantly, we help shield your foundation, arguably the most important part of the house, from elements like snow, water and ice that are a fact of life in our harsh Alberta climate. 

Whether you need repairs to existing parging or a fresh, new application, we’re the parging experts you need to work with to ensure your job is a success story. 

Your 100% satisfaction is our goal. Get started with a complimentary, no-obligation quote from J and J Coatings. Contact us today for your Parging needs!
service_area: Based in Edmonton, Alberta, we also serve Sherwood Park, Saint Albert, Fort Saskatchewan, Beaumont, Devon, Spruce Grove, Morinville, Leduc, Bon Accord, Stony Plain, Gibbons and Calmar.
services:
We specialize in parging. Whether it is a small repair or a new build you can count on J and J Coatings. We can apply a sand and cement parging coat over a variety of surfaces, poured or block concrete, brick, ICF or wood foundations and rigid styrofoam.

We can repair leaking basement windows by removing the existing parging, ensuring the window is installed properly and installing a weather membrane or elastomeric copolymer sealant and re-parging.
name: J And J Coatings - Parging Experts

profile:
WE’VE EARNED A REPUTATION FOR EXCELLENCE
Our family-owned business opened its doors over 20 years ago. Since then, we have built a reputation for genuinely caring about what our customers want and have enjoyed a large amount of referral business based on recommendations from past satisfied customers. We strive to provide the best quality and to achieve the highest possible level of customer satisfaction with every job we do.

All of our work comes with a one-year warranty, and our service phone line is open 24 hours, so you can reach us anytime – day or night.

NO MESS LEFT AFTER WE’VE GONE
When you hire The Best in the West Concrete Ltd., we guarantee you will receive quality workmanship and that our job site will always be clean coming in and going out. Your satisfaction with the services we provide is our top priority.

Give us a call today at 780-446-2198 to discuss your concrete and excavating needs.
services:
The Best in the West Concrete Ltd. has been servicing Edmonton and the surrounding areas since 1990. We are the number one choice for all your concrete needs. We deal in any kind of concrete removal. Plus, our professional technicians install concrete in the forms of:
Floors
Driveways
Parking Lots
Patios
In addition to our concrete pouring services, our experienced and highly trained crews offer excavation, hauling and removing, and conveying sand and gravel.
specialities:
The Best in the West Concrete Ltd. is committed to providing honest, professional, quality service. We specialize in the residential and commercial:

Conveying of sand and gravel
 
Breaking, hauling and removal of concrete
 
Supplying decorative and coloured concrete work
 
Stamping concrete
 
Providing bobcat services
name: Best in the West Concrete Inc
